name: fullstack-part3
description: Part 3 excercises of the Fullstack Course on FullStackOpen

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../fullstackopen-part3
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Tushar
